name: Bumper Battle (ClumsyWizard)
description:
Knock others off the arena to be the last person standing and become the ultimate Bumper Battle Champion! Make your amendment, cause this will ruin friendships!

************************************************************

This is my first foray into multiplayer game development. This game was made using the, as of writing, new unity Netcode For GameObject. This game is a small demo  that implements key multiplayer game features like:

  • Lobby
  • Character selection
  • Client  Prediction
  • Relay system
  • Mostly Server Authoritative

******************************************************
